data_dictionary.name: CaseId
data_dictionary.description: Case ID

data_dictionary.name: WEIGHT
data_dictionary.description: Post-stratification weights - 18+ general population (N=1,095)

data_dictionary.name: PS_A_Medicaid
data_dictionary.description: [I favor expanding Medicaid insurance benefits for low income families to provide coverage for treatment of opioid use disorders.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_B_Naloxone
data_dictionary.description: [I favor making naloxone...widely available and affordable without a prescription.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_C_Mandatory
data_dictionary.description: [I believe that making treatment mandatory is an effective way to help people with an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_D_GovSpend
data_dictionary.description: [I favor increasing government spending to improve treatment of opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_Treatment
data_dictionary.description: [I favor passing laws to protect people from criminal charges for drug related crimes if they attend substance use treatment.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_L_JailTreatment
data_dictionary.description: [I believe that people in jail/prison with an opioid use disorder should be allowed access to medication for their opioid use disorder...] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_J_JailHealth
data_dictionary.description: [I believe that incarceration/jail is an effective way to improve the health of people with an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: PS_K_JailOverdose
data_dictionary.description: [I believe that incarceration/jail is an effective way to reduce the risk of overdosing for people with an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: Release_Incarcerated
data_dictionary.description: [I believe jails and prisons should consider whether those convicted of non-violent crimes should be released to prevent the spread of COV-ID 19 within jails/prisons.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_A_HistoryWork
data_dictionary.description: [I would be willing to have a person with a past history of opioid use disorder start working closely with me on a job.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_C_CurrentWork
data_dictionary.description: [I would be willing to have a person with a current opioid use disorder start working closely with me on a job.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_D_CurrentMarry
data_dictionary.description: [I would be comfortable having a person with a current opioid use disorder marry into my close or immediate family.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_B_HistoryMarry
data_dictionary.description: [I am comfortable having a person with a past history of opioid use disorder marry into my close or immediate family.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_E_Dangerous
data_dictionary.description: [People with a current opioid use disorder are more dangerous than the general population.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_F_Trust
data_dictionary.description: [A person who currently has an opioid use disorder cannot be trusted.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_CurrentSteal
data_dictionary.description: [A person who currently has an opioid use disorder would be willing to steal money or valuable items in order to get drugs.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_HistorySteal
data_dictionary.description: [A person who has a past history of opioid use disorder would be willing to steal money or valuable items in order to get drugs.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_CurrentHighRisk
data_dictionary.description: [A person who currently has an opioid use disorder is likely to experience personal problems that would make them a high-risk employee in my workplace.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: SS_HistoryHighRisk
data_dictionary.description: [A person who has a past history of opioid use disorder is likely to experience personal problems that would make them a high-risk employee in my workplace.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_WhiteAdvantage
data_dictionary.description: [White people in the U.S. have certain advantages because of the color of their skin.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Successful
data_dictionary.description: [Race is very important in determining who is successful and who is not.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Prison
data_dictionary.description: [Race plays an important role in who gets sent to prison.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_SocServices
data_dictionary.description: [Race plays a major role in the type of social services (such as type of health care or day care) that people receive in the U.S.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Opportunity
data_dictionary.description: [Racial and ethnic minorities do not have the same opportunities as white people in the U.S.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_MinAdvantage
data_dictionary.description: [Racial and ethnic minorities in the U.S. have certain advantages because of the color of their skin.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Rich
data_dictionary.description: [Everyone who works hard, no matter what race they are, has an equal chance to become rich.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_WhiteBlame
data_dictionary.description: [White people are more to blame for racial discrimination than racial and ethnic minorities.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Discrimination
data_dictionary.description: [Mainly due to discrimination?] Do you think these differences are…

data_dictionary.name: RACE_LearnAbility
data_dictionary.description: [Because most Black people have less in-born ability to learn?] Do you think these differences are…

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Education
data_dictionary.description: [Because most Black people don't have the chance for education that it takes to rise out of poverty?] Do you think these differences are…

data_dictionary.name: RACE_Motivation
data_dictionary.description: [Because most Black people just don't have the motivation or will power to pull themselves up out of poverty?] Do you think these differences are…

data_dictionary.name: Personal_COVIDtest
data_dictionary.description: Have you been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)? If so, what was the result?

encodings.1.0: Yes, I have tested positive for COVID-19
encodings.2.0: Yes, I have NEVER tested positive for COVID-19
encodings.3.0: Yes, but I do not know the result
encodings.4.0: No, I have never been tested, but I experienced COVID-19 symptoms
encodings.5.0: No, I have never been tested and I have not had symptoms of COVID-19

data_dictionary.name: TestReason_Sick
data_dictionary.description: [I felt sick] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

data_dictionary.name: TestReason_Exposed
data_dictionary.description: [I was afraid I got exposed from a recent activity (e.g, being on an airplane, large wedding, concert)] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

data_dictionary.name: TestReason_Required
data_dictionary.description: [It was required] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

data_dictionary.name: TestReason_HighRisk
data_dictionary.description: [I consider myself high-risk for COVID-19 and want to be safe] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

data_dictionary.name: TestReason_Spread
data_dictionary.description: [I wanted to make sure I was not spreading the coronavirus to other people] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

data_dictionary.name: TestReason_Free
data_dictionary.description: [My city/town was offering free testing] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

data_dictionary.name: TestReason_Know
data_dictionary.description: [I just wanted to know] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

data_dictionary.name: HH_TestPositive
data_dictionary.description: [At least one has been tested and he/she tested positive] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_TestNegative
data_dictionary.description: [At lease one has been tested and he/she NEVER tested positive] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_TestUnknown
data_dictionary.description: [At least one has been tested and I do not know the result] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_COVIDSymptoms
data_dictionary.description: [At least one has not been tested, but he/she experienced COVID-19 symptoms] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_NoCOVID
data_dictionary.description: [At least one has not been tested and he/she has not experienced COVID-19 symptoms] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_NoMembers
data_dictionary.description: [There is no one else living in my household] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_DK
data_dictionary.description: [DON'T KNOW] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_SKP
data_dictionary.description: [SKIPPED ON WEB] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_REF
data_dictionary.description: [REFUSED] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: HH_COVIDdeath
data_dictionary.description: Has anyone in your household passed away/died because of COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

data_dictionary.name: WashHands
data_dictionary.description: [Washing/sanitizing hands more than usual] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

encodings.1.0: No, I don’t think it is necessary
encodings.2.0: No, I would like to but I cannot

data_dictionary.name: AvoidTransit
data_dictionary.description: [Avoiding public transportation (e.g., bus, subway, train, commuter rail)] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

encodings.1.0: No, I don’t think it is necessary
encodings.2.0: No, I would like to but I cannot

data_dictionary.name: LessGroups10
data_dictionary.description: [Limiting interactions with others to groups of 10 or less] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

encodings.2.0: No, I would like to but I cannot

data_dictionary.description: [Keeping a 6-foot radius when interacting with people you do not live with] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

encodings.2.0: No, I would like to but I cannot

data_dictionary.description: [Wearing a mask or face covering when leaving home] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

encodings.1.0: No, I don’t think it is necessary
encodings.2.0: No, I would like to but I cannot

data_dictionary.name: OtherMeasure

encodings.1.0: No, I don’t think it is necessary

data_dictionary.name: Restaurant

data_dictionary.name: Visitors
data_dictionary.description: [Gone to a friend, neighbor, or relative’s residence (that is not your own) or had visitors such as friends, neighbors or relatives at your residence] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

data_dictionary.description: [Attended a gathering with more than 10 people, such as a reunion, wedding, funeral, birthday party, concert, or religious service] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

data_dictionary.description: [Shared items like towels or utensils with other people not in your household] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

data_dictionary.description: [Had close contact (within 6 feet) with people who do not live with you and they were without masks or face coverings] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

data_dictionary.name: SelfNoMask
data_dictionary.description: [Been within 6 feet of someone outside your household and you were not wearing a mask or face covering] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

data_dictionary.name: VaxPlans
data_dictionary.description: If a vaccine against the coronavirus becomes available, do you plan to get vaccinated, or not?

encodings.0.0: No, I will not get a coronavirus vaccine
encodings.1.0: Yes, I will get a coronavirus vaccine as soon as it is available to me
encodings.2.0: Yes, I will get a coronavirus vaccine, but I will wait until it is proven to be safe and effective

data_dictionary.name: Vax_ProtectFam
data_dictionary.description: [I want to protect my family] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Vax_ProtectComm
data_dictionary.description: [I want to protect my community] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Vax_ProtectSelf
data_dictionary.description: [I want to protect myself] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Vax_DocRec
data_dictionary.description: [My doctor recommends vaccines] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Vax_NormalLife
data_dictionary.description: [Life won’t go back to normal until most people are vaccinated] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Vax_MostPublic
data_dictionary.description: [I think the majority of the public will get the vaccine] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Vax_Other
data_dictionary.description: [Other] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_Allergic
data_dictionary.description: [I am allergic to vaccines] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_Needles
data_dictionary.description: [I don’t like needles] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_NoConcern
data_dictionary.description: [I’m not concerned about getting seriously ill from the coronavirus] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_Time
data_dictionary.description: [I won’t have time to get vaccinated] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_GetInfected
data_dictionary.description: [I would be concerned about getting infected with the coronavirus from the vaccine] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_SideEffect
data_dictionary.description: [I would be concerned about side effects from the vaccine] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_DontWork
data_dictionary.description: [I don’t think vaccines work very well] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_Politics
data_dictionary.description: [Politicians might promote a vaccine to win votes even if it is not fully tested or safe] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_NotSerious
data_dictionary.description: [The coronavirus outbreak is not as serious as some people say it is] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_MostPublic
data_dictionary.description: [I don’t think the majority of the public will get the vaccine] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: NoVax_Other
data_dictionary.description: [Other] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Change_Famous
data_dictionary.description: [Famous people I trust get the coronavirus vaccine] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Change_Friends
data_dictionary.description: [Close friends get the coronavirus vaccine] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Change_MajPublic
data_dictionary.description: [The majority of the public gets the vaccine] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Change_Free
data_dictionary.description: [The vaccine is free] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Change_DocRec
data_dictionary.description: [My doctor recommends that I get the vaccine] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Change_Nothing
data_dictionary.description: [There is nothing that would make me get the vaccine] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?

data_dictionary.name: Distrust_Research
data_dictionary.description: [If your physician wanted you to participate in research, you trust that he or she would fully explain it to you.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: Distrust_Ask
data_dictionary.description: [I believe that I can freely ask my physicians any questions I want.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: Distrust_Harm
data_dictionary.description: [My physician would not ask me to participate in medical research if he or she thought it would harm me.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: Distrust_Protect
data_dictionary.description: [In deciding what treatment I will get, my physicians always tries to protect me from unnecessary risk.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: Distrust_Consent
data_dictionary.description: [People like me might be used as guinea pigs in research studies without our consent.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.description: [I think physicians prescribe medication as a way of experimenting on people without their knowledge or consent.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

data_dictionary.name: Distrust_Experiment
data_dictionary.description: [I believe that physicians have given me treatment as part of an experiment without my permission] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?
